short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows you to get defintions, pos, and synonyms in the omnibox

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This chrome extension allows you to get definitions, parts of speech, and synonyms from your search bar. Just type : in the search bar, press space or tab, and type your word into the search bar and information about the word automatically is shown, no need to search or press enter. Perfect for when you're writing an essay and want synonyms for a word, or want information about a word without opening a new tab.
